features: 10X MORE DURABLE THAN TRADITIONAL NONSTICK: Durathon nonstock soleplate glides smoothly over clothes.
60% MORE STEAM*: This steam iron for clothes offers superior wrinkle removal from even the most stubborn of fabrics.
NEAT, EASY STORAGE: 8 foot retractable cord retracts conveniently into base for neat, easy storage.
DOUBLES AS A VERTICAL STEAMER: The steam iron function lets you steam wrinkles from clothes while they’re still on the hanger.

3-WAY AUTO SHUTOFF: Have peace of mind knowing the clothing iron will automatically power off after 30 seconds when placed on its soleplate or side and after 15 minutes when propped upright on its heel.
100% QUALITY TESTED: All Hamilton Beach irons are pre-tested at the factory to ensure excellent quality when it arrives to your home. Condensation may be visible in the steam chamber from this test.

HANDLES THE TOUGHEST IRONING JOBS: It comes fully featured with anti-drip technology, spray, blast, adjustable steam, vertical steam, auto shut-off, self clean, Durathon nonstock, retractable cord plus 1500 watts to handle every tough ironing job.
LARGE DIAL AND COMFORT HANDLE. Adjusting temperatures and manoeuvring the iron is easy thanks to a large dial, textured grip and stable heel rest.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Hamilton Beach products are thoughtfully designed to make your life easier. We use consumer insights, in-depth research and rigorous testing to deliver the best solution to your everyday needs. Whether it's preparing delicious meals and beverages effortlessly, or making your clothes look their best, you can count on the brand that has spent over 100 years creating products with you in mind. Hamilton Beach Steam 1500 Watt Iron & Vertical Steamer with Scratch-Resistant Durathon Soleplate With incomparable steam output and a nonstick soleplate that is ten times more durable than traditional nonstick, you can’t go wrong with a Durathon iron at your side. It simply outperforms and outlasts most irons on the market—period. Durathon irons offer you more continuous steam* for superior wrinkle removal as well as superior glide performance. With exceptional iron features like these, you might imagine finishing all your ironing projects with superhuman speed. You’ll certainly have the stamina to stick with them ten times longer. 25% more continuous steam power than the leading competitor 10 times more durable than traditional nonstick Scratch-resistant durability Superior glide performance 8' retractable cord

10x More Durable Than Traditional Nonstick Durathon nonstock soleplate glides smoothly over clothes. From everyday ironing to the unique requirements of quilters, sewers, and crafters, Hamilton Beach Irons are indispensable. Whether you’re ironing a shirt for the office or putting the final touch on a creative project, you’ll find the perfect iron for every job right here. Look for iron features such as quick heating and powerful steam to finish your ironing projects fast and increase your confidence every time you press seams, piece quilt blocks, or fuse craft pieces.

Features: 60% More Steam This steam iron for clothes offers superior wrinkle removal from even the most stubborn of fabrics. Neat, Easy Storage 8 foot retractable cord retracts conveniently into base for neat, easy storage. Self Clean Removes lint and minerals to extend iron life. All Hamilton Beach irons are pre-tested at the factory to ensure excellent quality when it arrives to your home. Condensation may be visible in the steam chamber from this test. Doubles as a Vertical Steamer The steam iron function lets you steam wrinkles from clothes while they’re still on the hanger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than my previous iron
reviews.reviewText: My previous Hamilton Beach iron, which is still working and in rotation with these new ones (of which I bought two), had been my favorite for years...until now. So hard to tell from reviews and product description if something new will replace a favorite which breaks but glad I took a chance on these.Very pleased to say that I find these Hamilton Beach irons better than my old ones. Several reasons for that. Despite some reviews complaining of the weight of these, I actually found them to be slightly lighter than my others, yet still with enough heft to press clothes without undo effort. I have arthritis in several fingers so that was most welcome.These irons have slightly more ironing surface and more steam holes which probably explains why clothes are pressed well without additional weight. Being less weighty means that I can iron a little faster without loss of pressing quality.Also appreciate that the water reservoir (I use steam virtually every time I iron) is a lighter color so I can see the water level better. My other ones are much darker. Usually have to hold them up to the light to see the level.I have noticed that the water reservoir needs to be filled more frequently but that is probably because of the additional steam holes. That is an acceptable trade-off for me and only a comment, not a complaint.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as designed!
reviews.reviewText: LIghtweight, sturdy and well made. Was skeptical on sight unseen purchases (used to Brick n Mortar Stores) but was amazed on its performance. Retractable cord is a plus, hasn't broken (had this iron for over 6 months). I use it often with no regrets. Price was right and quick to heat up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Heat's quickly; irons well; BIG
reviews.reviewText: My old Smith-Corona iron finally died the death, so it was time to find a new one. I looked at more than a dozen, and this Hamilton-Beach seemed to have the feratures I needed. The retractable cord looked like a plus, so I went for it.First impression: the iron is big.In comparing the sole-plate of this iron to my old one, they're almost exactly the same size.But the housing for the retractable cord adds a good 3-1/2 inches to the length (or height, when standing). This makes the iron seem larger than it is, and can make for some initial awkwardness in handling if you're used to a shorter iron. But, you know, the retractable cord has to go -someplace-, and it was my choice to get it, so I don't blame the size on the manufacturer.A number of reviews have said this is a heavy iron; I don't find it so. If anything, it's a trifle lighter than my old iron. And, after all, an iron -has- to have a certain amount of heft to properly do its job. With a little practice to get used to the greater length, I was soon pretty confortable handling the appliance.The controls are straightforward, functional, and well located for my needs.The iron heats rapidly -- much faster than the old one. It was ready to go in well under a minute.One caveat here is that the "power-on light" never goes off. On most other irons I've used, the light goes off when you've reached the preset operating temperature; with this one you just have to guess. If they fix this item, I'd give the iron another star.Steam and dry iron features both work well.Instruction manual, such as it is, doesn't mention \how much\ water it takes to fill the iron. I figured it wouldbe about a cup, and ended up spilling water all over on my first attempt. Turns out it takes a little over 3/4 cup.Next time, I'll know, but this information should be in the manual.There is a "self-clean" button which I've not tried yet, but I find that an interesting concept.The price is not much more than I paid for my old iron, 20 years ago.Overall, I am pleased with this iron, and would recommend it, Do be aware of the extra length, though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Iron works well.
reviews.reviewText: Settings are easy to set and the iron does its job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had this iron for six years. I’m one of those old school folks that irons at least once a week, so I’ve used it a lot. Today was the second time in a year the iron accidentally fell off my ironing board onto our hard wood floors. And it still works like a dream. I wouldn’t advocate such iron abuse, but when accidents happen this iron just keeps on ironing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Terrific Iron. Well worth the price.
reviews.reviewText: Now that Bed, Bath & Beyond is more or less out of business decided to give Amazon a try. This iron had a tremendous number of good reviews and the price was fair, in the $30 range. Far superior to any iron I have owned in years. Multiple settings, ability to control how much steam comes out, auto shut-off (I think) and a decent weight which I like in an iron. Very important to me: retractable cord which works well. Could not be more pleased.

I upgraded from a basic steam iron to this one and clearly see the difference. This iron is very efficient, heats-up super fast in a few seconds, and just glides through the garment. The icing on the cake is that the cable retracts into the iron after usage and is super convenient to store without the hassle of dealing with a loose / messy cable hanging around the iron-board. Value for money product and is highly recommended.
Muy buen producto, me agrada mucho el cable retráctil
Es la segunda que compro😀, la primera me duró 5 años y todavía funciona. Bueno hacía falta una nueva

reviews.reviewTitle: Better than my expensive Rowenta iron
reviews.reviewText: Good weight and lots of steam makes ironing quicker with much better results. Lots of nice features, and a terrific value. Highly recommended.
Es una de mis planchas favoritas, está un poco pesada pero te acostumbras. Me encanta el vapor que tira.
